ageVerification.title: Age Verification Required
ageVerification.description: You must be 18 years or older to access this website.
ageVerification.question: Are you 18 years or older?

underage.title: Access Restricted
underage.description: Sorry, you must be 18 years or older to access this website.
underage.message: This website contains content that is only suitable for adults. Please return when you are 18 years or older.

footer.description: Premium wines and gourmet food products. Curated selection of the finest delicacies.

legal.copyright: © {{year}} GourmetHub. Developed by {{developer}}. All rights reserved.

hero.mainDescription: Discover our carefully curated collection of fine wines and exquisite gourmet products from around the world.
hero.title: Ready to upgrade your style?
hero.description: Discover our latest collections and find your perfect fit.

categories.title: Shop by Category
categories.description: Explore our curated selection of premium wines and gourmet foods

featured.title: Featured Products
featured.description: Our most popular items, handpicked for you

empty.title: Your cart is empty
empty.description: Looks like you haven't added anything to your cart yet.

emptyCart.title: Your cart is empty
emptyCart.description: You need to add items to your cart before checking out.

orderConfirmed.title: Order Confirmed!
orderConfirmed.description: Thank you for your purchase. Your order has been confirmed and will be shipped soon.
orderConfirmed.emailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address.

paymentMethod.title: Payment Method
paymentMethod.paypalRedirect: You will be redirected to PayPal to complete your purchase securely.
paymentMethod.codDescription: Pay with cash when your order is delivered to your doorstep. A small COD fee may apply.
paymentMethod.noPaymentDetails: No need to share payment details online

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and policies. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

empty.title: No FAQs Available
empty.description: We're currently updating our FAQ section. Please check back soon or contact our support team for assistance.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have a question or need assistance? We're here to help. Get in touch with our team.

form.subject: Subject
form.orderIdPlaceholder: Enter order ID if related to an order
form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again later or contact us directly at {{email}}

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

empty.title: Contact Information Unavailable
empty.description: We're currently updating our contact information. Please try again later or email us directly.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are passionate about delivering high-quality products and exceptional shopping experiences to our customers.

portoStore.title: Our Store in the Heart of Porto
portoStore.description: Visit our beautiful store located in the historic center of Porto, where tradition meets modern shopping experience.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded with a vision to revolutionize online shopping through quality and innovation.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A dedicated group of professionals working to bring you the best shopping experience.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Built on trust, quality, and customer satisfaction as our core principles.

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.description: Committed to providing the best products and service to our valued customers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide our customers with an exceptional online shopping experience by offering high-quality products, outstanding customer service, and innovative solutions that make shopping easier and more enjoyable.

stores.title: Our Store
stores.description: Visit our store in Porto and experience our products in person.

empty.title: Store Information Unavailable
empty.description: We're currently updating our store information. Please try again later or contact us directly.

product.shippingDescription: Free standard shipping on all orders over 100€. Delivery within 3-5 business days.
product.returnsDescription: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery. Items must be in original condition and packaging.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.description: Thank you for your purchase. Your order has been confirmed and will be processed soon.

cancel.title: Payment Cancelled
cancel.description: Your payment was cancelled. No charges have been made to your account.
cancel.noCharges: No charges have been made to your account. You can try again or contact support if you need assistance.

error.title: Error Loading Order
error.notFound: Order not found or access token invalid

status.title: Order Status
status.paymentConfirmed: Payment confirmed and order is being processed

unpaid.title: Payment Processing
unpaid.description: Your order has been placed and we're confirming your payment. This usually takes a few minutes.
unpaid.secondaryDescription: We're securely processing your payment with our payment processor. This step ensures your transaction is authorized and protected.

pending.title: Payment Processing
pending.description: Your order has been placed and we're confirming your payment. This usually takes a few minutes.
pending.secondaryDescription: We're securely processing your payment with our payment processor. This step ensures your transaction is authorized and protected.

paid.title: Payment Confirmed
paid.description: Your payment has been confirmed and your order is being prepared for shipment.
paid.secondaryDescription: Our team is carefully preparing your items for shipment. We'll notify you as soon as your package is on its way.

shipped.title: Order Shipped
shipped.description: Your order has been shipped and is on its way to you.
shipped.secondaryDescription: Your order is now traveling to your address. You can track its progress using the tracking link above.

completed.title: Order Delivered
completed.description: Your order has been successfully delivered to your address.
completed.secondaryDescription: Your package has arrived safely at your address. We hope you enjoy your purchase!
completed.submessage: We hope you enjoy your products. Consider leaving a review or shopping with us again.

problem.title: Order Issue
problem.description: There is an issue with your order. Please contact our support team for assistance.
problem.secondaryDescription: We've encountered an issue that requires immediate attention. Our support team is ready to help resolve this quickly.
problem.submessage: Please contact our support team immediately to resolve this issue with your order.

canceled.title: Order Canceled
canceled.description: Your order has been canceled. No charges have been made to your account.
canceled.secondaryDescription: Your order has been successfully canceled and no charges have been processed. You can place a new order anytime.

status.paymentProcessingDescription: We're confirming your payment with our payment processor. This usually takes a few minutes. You'll receive an email confirmation once the payment is confirmed.

about.title: About Us | E-commerce Shop
about.description: Learn more about our e-commerce shop and our mission.

contact.title: Contact Us | E-commerce Shop
contact.description: Get in touch with our team for any questions or support.

faq.title: FAQ | E-commerce Shop
faq.description: Frequently asked questions about our e-commerce shop.

stores.title: Our Store | E-commerce Shop
stores.description: Visit our store in Porto and experience our products in person.

noResults.title: No results found
noResults.description: Try adjusting your search terms or browse our categories.

noProducts.title: No products available
noProducts.description: Check back later for new products.

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as language preferences and shopping cart.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.

privacyTerms.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Service
privacyTerms.description: Learn about how we collect, use, and protect your information, and the terms that govern your use of our services.

empty.title: No Content Available
empty.description: Terms and conditions content is not available at the moment.

products.title: All Products
products.description: Discover our curated selection of premium wines, spirits, and gourmet foods.
